website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking, inexpensive bag that makes you look cool on court.
pros: Great price point for a bag that can hold a lot of gear as well as up to six rackets
Lightweight, with one grab handle and two shoulder straps
Small pocket on the front fits things like sunscreen, cell phones (even the large ones), and keys
cons: The material is a little thin, which doesn't protect the racquets as well

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and roomy
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and good quality. The material is excellent and because it is dark gray it will disguise when dirty. I can carry 2 racquets and a tennis ball jar in one compartment; and my changing clothes in the other (shoes included). a couple of extra side bags helps to carry your wallet, phone and extra stuff that is not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Delgado

customer_reviews.title: ... year and seams are splitting everywhere and it looks terrible. I admit he's tough on his stuff
customer_reviews.text: My son has had this bag for less than a year and seams are splitting everywhere and it looks terrible. I admit he's tough on his stuff, but he's had two prior bags where this wasn't an issue. This bag is pretty poorly made. It is spacious though and a great price. You get what you pay for; I'll be replacing this after just one year.
customer_reviews.author: StoliR

customer_reviews.title: Great roomy bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful tennis bag! Very roomy. Great size.
customer_reviews.author: buschfam

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material, bad design
customer_reviews.text: The bag is as light as a feather. The material is as thin as paper. It will be too optimistic to expect it can last for a year. I will applause if someone can really carry six racquets with the bag. Unless unzipped. There is no separate space for shoes. There are two zipped extra spaces on both sides, yet too narrow. Maybe good for a few flyers, but not even for keys when the bag is fully loaded. Maybe the only good point is the price. Even though it still doesn't match the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Floria Tanith

customer_reviews.title: Many eggs in one basket... but it’s a good thing
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag! If you can forgo the covers for the racquets, you can fit more than what they say. I currently have 7 racquets, but of assorted sizes, and I believe I can fit 1 more as well as 2 cans of balls, 2 pockets to hold all of your head and grip tape, dampeners, etc. The strap has a comfortable oversized pad to keep the strap from digging into your shoulder. Price was fantastic and am very pleased with all aspects of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Phil J Fry

customer_reviews.title: Good bag: fits 3 racquets, small amount of gear, and high-top shoes
customer_reviews.text: I will update my review if I think the durability misses the mark, but the material may not hold up for day to day use too long. Since I am only playing a couple of times a week, I anticipate this bag lasting a couple of years. Looks great, fair amount of room (as expected from the other reviews and dimensions in the description), and the zippers work great for me.
customer_reviews.author: ChillyPhilly

customer_reviews.title: This item was a real disappointment. The stitching started to fray after about two ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This item was a real disappointment. The stitching started to fray after about two weeks of use. No padding at all. For a product that gets placed on the ground and tossed in the car trunk it is not very durable. I am returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln Crosley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality material
customer_reviews.text: Great quality material, stitching, and zippers. Shoulder straps could be better. Actually used this for discreet rifle bag for airsoft. Fit most of my extra gear in the big zippered space and my airsoft rifle in the other.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Head tennis bag as described
customer_reviews.text: The Head tennis bag I ordered came just as described, just what I wanted. It was a gift for a family member who was very delighted with it and has used it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert V Hollinger

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder Pad ripped with one use.
customer_reviews.text: The shoulder pad didn't even survive the 3 mile walk to the tennis court, it really makes me worry about the quality of the rest of the bag, if the Shoulder Pad couldn't even survive a single use how long is the rest of the bag going to last.
customer_reviews.author: derek

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to close with two rackets, shoes, balls, and water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Treinen

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not really 6R, more like 3 or 4R. Bag smaller than my earlier Wilson 6R bag. Has 2 side pocket which is good.
customer_reviews.author: SKG

customer_reviews.title: big space
customer_reviews.text: The quality of bag is just so so. It is light but it does not have a rigid frame of bag to keep a shape; it is like a shopping bag.
customer_reviews.author: Choist

customer_reviews.title: Good sized bag, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Large bag. Holds my 3 racquets, a couple cans of balls, shoes, water bottle, towel, and still has room left over. Somewhat cheap feeling but looks nice and I carry all my stuff with out issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Tennis bag for money
customer_reviews.text: Holds about 4 raquets and few small accessories.There isn't much protection for the content
customer_reviews.author: Young Lim

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bag for at least 8 rackets and space for other stuff
customer_reviews.text: This bag currently holds 2 tennis rackets and 2 Racquetball rackets. Theres two pouches, one side holds all four rackets and the other side holds all the balls and everything else. Fantastic if your going to be playing tennis often
customer_reviews.author: FareedG115

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and the price is right, but not very durable... already showing signs of extreme wear despite very light use and only two months old.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: the bag is very beautiful and practical due to the color that hides the red color of the tennis courts.
customer_reviews.author: sandra Guerra Prisel

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. A lot of pockets and not too ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. A lot of pockets and not too big and not too small. Perfect for my two racquets and gear.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L.

customer_reviews.title: Buy larger bag if you need to fit 6 racquets!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good bag , but for 2, max 3 racquets,not 6 as described!!! My daughter loves it: fits 2 racquets, balls, shoes, water bottle, jacket, everything she needs to go to tournament even right after school :it can be worn as backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is good, but I think it is no so strong for a big weight.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Soto

customer_reviews.title: Good thing
customer_reviews.text: Great bag... I use one pocket to hold rackets and it holds 3, comfortably. Other pocket for towel and balls. Works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy again
customer_reviews.text: This tennis bag is simply great. Holds six racquets plus two other compartments for other tennis gear or keys and wallets.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Not alot of Room
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the size, Not much room for clothes, shoes, and towel
customer_reviews.author: CustomerCB

customer_reviews.title: Convenience to use
customer_reviews.text: Good tennis bag, it designed for 6 racquets and a bit too big for my use with 2 racquets and other stuff, but it is OK.
customer_reviews.author: M. Elisman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, functional and fits the family
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag. We fit 2 adult and 2 child racquets plus all our tennis shoes and socks and there is room for more.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: The weight is light and it has 2 strips can carry like a backpack
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my "Tennis Lover" boyfriend, and he loves it. The weight is light and it has 2 strips can carry like a backpack. Very convenience!
customer_reviews.author: Serendipity_ArBi

customer_reviews.title: durable bag
customer_reviews.text: nice durable bag. holds everything I need for the day
customer_reviews.author: dh

customer_reviews.title: Very Roomy Tennis Bag
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the Head Core 3R bag, but was shocked when I received it because it as tiny! Immediately I ordered the 6R - and it was exactly what I was looking for. It fits 3 tennis rackets very nicely, with lots of room to spare for balls, water bottles, etc. You don't have to worry about running out of room with this bag. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Todvincenzo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Honestly just buy it. It has tons of space and I feel confident walking on the courts with it.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad looking bad but it is built cheap. I guess you get what you pay for. I don’t expect this to last my son’s tennis season and we will need a new one before summer. Also, does not have protection from weather for the rackets.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Great, roomy bag
customer_reviews.text: Great, roomy bag....... The fabric is a bit cheap, but hey, for the price! Overall, very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: HAPPYTODAY

product_meta.title: HEAD Core 6R Combi Tennis Racquet Bag - 6 Racket Tennis Equipment Duffle Bag
product_meta.description:
About the Bag

Packing for a competitive weekend or just a day trip to the court is now a lot easier thanks to the Core 6 Racquet Combi bag. It features a large zippered main compartment for all your tennis equipment essentials. For easy access to small items such as your phone or keys, the bag offers dual exterior zippered accessory pockets. Thanks to the adjustable shoulder strap you can either casually flip it over your shoulder or carry like a backpack.

• The tennis racquet carrying bag has adjustable straps that offer multiple carry options.

• Racquet compartment can hold up to 6 racquets safely and securely.

HEAD

Born out of engineering a better way to ski and play tennis, we have used the most modern techniques available to improve athletic equipment for decades. Now, we have turned that same vision and attention to detail to all racquet sports to bring you nothing but the best sports equipment & workout apparel available.
feature_bullets: HEAD PERFORMANCE: Born out of revolutionizing how we ski and play tennis, HEAD has constantly pushed athletic equipment into the modern era. With decades of experience in all racquet sports; HEAD offers nothing but the best tennis equipment on the market.
UP TO SIX RACQUETS: The equipment bag's main racquet compartment offers enough room for up to 6 racquets. Keep your racquets properly protected and playing like new for seasons to come.
AMPLE STORAGE SPACE: Each racket bag features a large main compartment as well as dual exterior zippered accessory pockets for smaller items such as your phone or keys.
MULTIPLE CARRY OPTIONS: With easily adjustable straps, the athletic bag can be casually flipped over the shoulder or carried like a backpack.
SPECS: The sports duffle bag measures 30 x 13 x 11in and is made of a durable fabric that will stand up to seasons' of use.
